page.title: 12LIFE STYLES FORRES EAST
page.content: The year 1985 in Forres has not brought any stunning new trends in { {fashion}but there are a few starting in London.This year Forres's fashion for girls is skirts,(knee-length) flowery blouses and three-quarter length trousers and all these clothes are on pastel shades which is definately in. For the boys, the styles are: trousers, white and very baggy, and shirts also, white and very baggy. Although these fashions are in for boys, you still get the few who dress in the styles of punk, mod and casual. Accessories for the girls are: earrings, jumbo clips for the hair and pastel coloured necklaces. Also for the hairstyles it is either bobs, hair cut short or very long hair tied back in a long pleat. All in all, fashion-wise, Forres is quite trendy.
